note.p: Geologist. BA, Oxford, 1881. Assistant geological surveyor, New South Wales, Australia, 1882. Professor of geology, Sydney, 1891. Leader of an expedition to Funafuti atoll in the Ellice Islands (now Tuvalu) to bore a deep section, 1897–8. Joined Ernest Shackleton’s Antarctic expedition, 1907–9. Knighted, 1920.
